Class Ball

  • java.lang.Object
    • Ball

  • public class Ball
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class Ball represents the functionality of the ball.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Ball() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void checkCollisionWith(Computer computer)
      Checks if the ball collides with computer's paddle.
      void checkCollisionWith(Player player)
      Checks if the ball collides with player's paddle.
      int getX()
      Gets the x value of the ball.
      int getY()
      Gets the y value of the ball.
      void increaseSpeed()
      Increase the speed of the ball.
      boolean isBehindLeftPanel()
      Checks if the ball is out of the left side of the screen.
      boolean isBehindRightPanel()
      Checks if the ball is out of the right side of the screen.
      void paint(java.awt.Graphics g)
      Paints the ball on the screen.
      void resetPosition()
      Resets the ball's position when some of the players looses the ball.
      void update()
      Updates the ball's position.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update()
        Updates the ball's position.

      • paint

        public void paint(java.awt.Graphics g)
        Paints the ball on the screen.
        Parameters:
        g - represents the ball.

      • checkCollisionWith

        public void checkCollisionWith(Player player)
        Checks if the ball collides with player's paddle. If the ball collides with player's paddle reverse direction of the ball.
        Parameters:
        player - player's paddle.

      • checkCollisionWith

        public void checkCollisionWith(Computer computer)
        Checks if the ball collides with computer's paddle. If the ball collides with computer's paddle reverse direction of the ball.
        Parameters:
        computer - computer's paddle.

      • isBehindLeftPanel

        public boolean isBehindLeftPanel()
        Checks if the ball is out of the left side of the screen.
        Returns:
        true if the ball is behind the left panel of the screen false otherwise.

      • isBehindRightPanel

        public boolean isBehindRightPanel()
        Checks if the ball is out of the right side of the screen.
        Returns:
        true if the ball is behind the right panel of the screen false otherwise.

      • resetPosition

        public void resetPosition()
        Resets the ball's position when some of the players looses the ball.

      • getX

        public int getX()
        Gets the x value of the ball.
        Returns:
        x the x-coordinate of the ball

      • getY

        public int getY()
        Gets the y value of the ball.
        Returns:
        y the y-coordinate of the ball.

      • increaseSpeed

        public void increaseSpeed()
        Increase the speed of the ball.
